Text.Name: LcSchoolPanda
Text.Desc: Send it to another sect to improve our relation.

Text.Name: Magic_YG_RealYinYang
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the artifact mastery, Qi barrier, and secret body power and endurance. Release the skill again to stop this effect.
